text:
@senatemajldr And what exactly does the GOP proposal for a $377 million poorly remodeled West Wing, a new $1.75 billion FBI building, and $8 billion for military have to do with helping Americans suffering from Coronavirus and our economy?
We've seen your proposal. Stop.
